verses.verse: <S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> of them <S%H4294>rods,<s%> one for each <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>house,<s%> of all their <S%H5387>princes<s%> according to their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H4294>rods:<s%> <S%H3789>write<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> on his <S%H4294>rod.<s%>

You shall <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> on the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi;<s%> for there shall be <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4294>rod<s%> for each <S%H7218>head<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses.<s%>
You shall lay them <S%H3240>up<s%> in the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> where I meet with <S%H3259>you.<s%>

It shall <S%H4294>happen,<s%> that the rod of the <S%H376>man<s%> whom I shall <S%H977>choose<s%> shall <S%H6524>bud:<s%> and I will make to <S%H7918>cease<s%> from me the <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which they murmur against <S%H3885>you.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and all their <S%H5387>princes<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H4294>rods,<s%> for each <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H259>one,<s%> according to their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> even <S%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H4294>rods:<s%> and the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> was <S%H8432>among<s%> their <S%H4294>rods.<s%>
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> laid <S%H3240>up<s%> the <S%H4294>rods<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony.<s%>

It happened on the next <S%H4283>day,<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony;<s%> and <S%H4294>behold,<s%> the rod of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> was <S%H6524>budded,<s%> and put <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H6525>buds,<s%> and <S%H6692>produced<s%> <S%H6731>blossoms,<s%> and <S%H1580>bore<s%> ripe <S%H8247>almonds.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> brought <S%H3318>out<s%> all the <S%H4294>rods<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and they <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4294>rod.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H7725>"Put<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> to be <S%H4931>kept<s%> for a <S%H226>token<s%> against the children of <S%H4805>rebellion;<s%> that you may make an <S%H3615>end<s%> of their <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> against <S%H4191>me,<s%> that they not die."
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1478>"Behold,<s%> we perish! We are <S%H6>undone!<s%> We are all <S%H6>undone!<s%>
Everyone who comes <S%H7131>near,<s%> who comes near to the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H4191>dies!<s%> Will we <S%H8552>all<s%> <S%H1478>perish?<s%>"
